text: <@U0YQQRNU8> . Sorry if you are not the right person.  My question is, why are there two repositories with sawtooth? one in hyledger and other in inteleger. Wich of them is the best?.  or they are in mirror. Thank you.
<@U231CKQH2|karn> uploaded a file: <https://hyperledgerproject.slack.com/files/karn/F28GT8F96/Trying_to_use_mktclient_cli.txt|Trying to use mktclient cli>

file.title: Trying to use mktclient cli

vagrant@vagrant-ubuntu-trusty-64:/project/sawtooth-core$ ./bin/mktclient --name mkt
[09:13:25 mktplace.mktplace_communication WARNING] operation failed with response: 400

comment.comment: Is anyone else getting this error? When I try to start mktclient I get an 'operation failed with response:400'

text: Could you please post sawtooth-validator log?
It is /var/log/sawtooth-validator/base000-debug.log
or post /var/log/sawtooth-validator/base000-error.log
<@U231CKQH2>
<@U1ZUSJHAA> hi feihu, I don't seem to have that file(or folder) in /var/log/
It is in the node where you run './bin/txnvalidator'
<@U231CKQH2>
<@U1ZUSJHAA> The log helped me figure it out. I was using the wrong config file which didn't have the marketplace transaction family on it. Thanks for your help
OK
<@U1ZUSJHAA> also I think they changed the path to the log files. It's /sawtooth-core/validator/logs/base000-debug.log
With that regression can I do some thing? or I have to wait? Thanks

attachments.fallback: [September 5th, 2016 8:03 PM] amundson: <@U26PBUZRT> that's a regression in the interaction between mktplace and a recent change to journal_core
attachments.text: <@U26PBUZRT> that's a regression in the interaction between mktplace and a recent change to journal_core

text: <@U26PBUZRT> the two github locations are mirrors.

<@U26PBUZRT>: like <@U0VKPD6A2> is suggesting, both github locations should have the same content.  However, you should use the hyperledger one as that is where we prefer PRs and where will be hookup up Jenkins for testing.
<@U26PBUZRT> : I'll try and have a fix for that issue out in a few minutes.
<@U26PBUZRT>: the issue should be fixed in current master
<@U205V1M45|jce23> has joined the channel
<@U0UFDAS91|christophera> has joined the channel

In two weeks, on Wednesday, August 21st, Mic Bowman of Intel will be giving the Hyperledger Identity WG an update on the architecture of Hyperledger Sawtooth’s EPR (End Point Registry) at 12pm ET (9am PT).

As always, information on scheduled WG meetings are in the Hyperledger Wiki is at <https://github.com/hyperledger/hyperledger/wiki/PublicMeetingCalendar> — notes and recordings of Hyperledger Identity WG prior meetings are also in the Wiki at <https://github.com/hyperledger/hyperledger/wiki/Identity-WG>.

attachments.title: hyperledger/hyperledger
attachments.text: Hyperledger Project is a new Collaborative Project at The Linux Foundation. The technical community is just getting started and will be adding code to the repository in the coming weeks. Check hype...
